thread.title: BRIEF-RLJ Lodging Trust Announces Sale Of Sheraton Philadelphia Society Hill For $95.5 Mln

title: BRIEF-RLJ Lodging Trust Announces Sale Of Sheraton Philadelphia Society Hill For $95.5 Mln

organizations.name: brief-rlj lodging trust announces sale of sheraton philadelphia society hill
brief-rlj lodging trust announces sale of sherato
philadelphia society hill for $95.5 mln reuters

text:
March 28, 2018 / 12:31 PM / Updated 13 minutes ago BRIEF-RLJ Lodging Trust Announces Sale Of Sheraton Philadelphia Society Hill For $95.5 Mln Reuters Staff 
March 28 (Reuters) - RLJ Lodging Trust: 
* RLJ LODGING TRUST ANNOUNCES SALE OF SHERATON PHILADELPHIA SOCIETY HILL FOR $95.5 MILLION 
* RLJ LODGING TRUST - COMPANY INTENDS TO APPLY NET PROCEEDS FROM SALE TO PAY DOWN ITS CREDIT FACILITY AND FOR GENERAL CORPORATE PURPOSES 
* RLJ LODGING TRUST - DEAL FOR APPROXIMATELY $262,000 PER KEY Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
